sect3.title: Instalação de Net::SSLeay

note.para: If enabling the external tests, one test in t/external/15_altnames.t may fail.

sect3.para: This module uses a variant of the standard build and installation instructions: yes '' | perl Makefile.PL && make && make test Now, as the root user: make install

sect3.title: Explicações do Comando
sect3.para: yes '': Perl will ask if you wish to run external tests, which will fail if you do not have network connectivity. The default is 'n', specifying this allows you to script the build.
